content: small circumference knitting for the sleeves 3 5 mm / us 4 circular needles with a cable of at least 80 cm / 32 inches for the body gauge 22 sts and 28 row = 10 cm / 4 inches of stockinette stitch on the larger needles after blocking note always use the needle size that gets you the right gauge notions 4 stitch markers 6 locking markers cable needle if using waste yarn tapestry needle blocking tools
